DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of modafinil in reducing cocaine use in subjects with cocaine dependence.
DOC.brief_title: Modafinil for the Treatment of Cocaine Dependence - 1
DOC.detailed_description: This is a double-blind, placebo-controlled, parallel group design study to evaluate the efficacy and safety of modafinil in reducing cocaine use in subjects with cocaine dependence.
DOC.criteria: Participant must have DSMIV diagnosis of cocaine dependence as determined by SCID. Must be seeking treatment for cocaine dependence. Must be able to understand and provide written informed consent. Please contact the study site for more information.
